ZAMAN IT Software Solutions

ZAMAN IT, we specialize in innovative and reliable software development. Below is a list of our key software offerings along with links to their live demos.

Business Software

HR Manager - Human Resource Management System HR Software.

HR Manager is a powerful HRMS that streamlines employee data management, recruitment, performance evaluations, payroll, and benefits. Its intuitive interface enhances efficiency and compliance for businesses of all sizes.

Live Demo
Order Now
ERP Solutions: Revolutionizing Company Management.

We offers cutting-edge Enterprise Resource Planning systems designed to streamline and optimize all aspects of your business operations. Our innovative solutions integrate seamlessly into your existing workflows, providing real-time data analytics.

Live Demo
Order Now
Best Inventory Management System Software.

Inventory management software helps businesses track and manage their inventory levels efficiently. It enables real-time monitoring of stock, automates order processes, and provides insights through reporting and analytics

Order Now
POS - Point-of-sale (POS) Management System Software.

Point-of-sale (POS) Management System Software is a versatile tool used by retail businesses to streamline transactions and manage sales processes efficiently. It typically includes features such as barcode scanning, reporting.

Live Demo
Order Now
Travel Management System Software.

Travel Management System Software is a comprehensive solution designed to streamline and automate various aspects of travel planning and management for both individuals and organizations. It typically includes features such as itinerary planning.

Live Demo
Order Now
Restaurant Management System Software.

Health Sotware

Hospital – Hospital Management System Software.

Hospital Management System Software is a comprehensive solution designed to streamline the administrative, operational, and clinical processes within a healthcare facility. It encompasses various modules such as patient registration, appointment.

Pharmacy Management System Software.

Pharmacy Management System Software is a specialized solution tailored for the efficient management of pharmacy operations within healthcare facilities. It includes features such as inventory management, prescription processing.

Live Demo
Order Now

Others Software

Freight Management System Software.

People who work in the freight forwarding business use freight forwarding software to run their businesses, such as communicating with customers and other people. Full-life cycle freight forwarding software will have CRM, quotes, documents.

School Management System Software.

A School Management System Software is a centralized platform that facilitates the efficient administration and operation of educational institutions. It encompasses functions like student enrollment, attendance tracking, grading, scheduling.

Prescription Writing Management Software

Prescription writing software is software that helps physicians and other healthcare professionals write prescriptions. As a doctor, you can use prescription writing software in a lot of different ways. It can help them make a patient profile, put in the diagnosis.t.
